question: Who has become the second Independent Chairman of the International Cricket Council (ICC)?
explanation:
New Zealand's Greg Barclay has been elected as the new independent Ahairman of the International Cricket Council (ICC).
He is also the second independent chairman of the international body, after Shashank Manohar of India. Greg Barclay served as the Director of New Zealand Cricket Team since 2012. He had also been the Director of 2015 Men's World Cup, held in Australia and New Zealand.
